wax_seal_story.title: Why a wax seal?
paragraphs: For centuries, important letters were sealed with wax. Breaking the seal was a moment of anticipation and joy.
We bring that tradition back, in digital form. Your guests experience the same special moment: breaking the seal, unfolding the invitation, discovering your story.
No boring design. No standard card. A real moment.

items.question: Can I edit the invitation after publishing?
items.answer: Yes! You can always change texts, times and locations. Guests automatically see the latest version.

items.question: How long does my invitation stay online?
items.answer: Depending on your package: Basic 9 months, Signature 12 months, Premium 16 months.

items.question: Can guests respond without an app?
items.answer: Absolutely. Everything works in the browser, on any device. No download required.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of guests?
items.answer: The Basic plan supports up to 75 guests, Signature up to 150 guests, and Premium is unlimited.

items.question: Can I print the invitation?
items.answer: Our invitations are designed for digital use. We don't offer a print version, but you can always put the link on a physical card.

items.question: What about my guests' privacy?
items.answer: We take privacy seriously. Guest data is only used for RSVPs and is not visible to other guests. You can export or delete all data.

items.question: What exactly is Ja, Voor Altijd?
items.answer: Ja, Voor Altijd is a platform where you create beautiful digital wedding invitations. With our unique wax seal experience, you'll impress your guests. They open the invitation by clicking on the seal - a magical moment they won't soon forget.

items.question: Who is this for?
items.answer: For all couples looking for a modern, stylish, and eco-friendly way to invite their guests. Whether you're planning an intimate ceremony or a big celebration, we have a package that fits.

items.question: How long does it take to create an invitation?
items.answer: Most couples are done within 30 minutes! You choose a template, fill in your details, adjust colors and you're done. You can always come back later to make changes.

items.question: Can I try the invitation before paying?
items.answer: Yes! You can start building your invitation for free. You'll see a live preview with watermark. Only when you're satisfied and want to publish, you choose a package.

items.question: In which languages is the invitation available?
items.answer: You can create your invitation fully in Dutch or English. The texts are freely customizable, so you can also use other languages if you wish.

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.title: Pricing Questions
pricing.description: Everything about packages, payments and what you get

items.question: What does an invitation cost?
items.answer: We have three packages: Basic (€125), Signature (€175) and Premium (€225). All prices are one-time - no subscription or hidden costs. Check our pricing page for all details.

items.question: Is this a one-time payment?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely. You pay once. Basic stays online for 9 months, Signature for 12 months, and Premium for 16 months. No monthly fees.

items.question: Can I upgrade to a more expensive package later?
items.answer: Certainly! You can always upgrade and only pay the difference. Convenient if you start small and need more features later.

items.question: What's the difference between the RSVP options?
items.answer: Basic offers Yes/No/Maybe responses with guest segmentation, CSV export and a not yet responded list. Signature adds dietary needs and 1-2 extra questions. Premium gives unlimited extra questions and a general message field.

items.question: Are there extra costs for more guests?
items.answer: No, there are no costs per guest. With Basic you can invite up to 75 guests, Signature up to 150 guests, and Premium is unlimited.

technical.name: Technical
technical.title: Technical Questions
technical.description: About editing, sharing and managing your invitation

items.question: Can I edit the invitation after publishing?
items.answer: Yes! You can always change texts, times, locations and other details. Guests automatically see the latest version when they open the link.

items.question: How do I share the invitation with my guests?
items.answer: You get a unique link that you can share via WhatsApp, email, SMS or social media.

items.question: Does it work on all devices?
items.answer: Yes, our invitations work perfectly on phones, tablets and computers. No app needed - everything works in the browser.

items.question: What happens when the online period expires?
items.answer: We'll send you a reminder 30 days before your invitation goes offline. You have 30 days after the expiration date to download it as a keepsake.

items.question: Can I add my own photos and videos?
items.answer: This will be available soon!

rsvp.name: RSVP
rsvp.title: RSVP Questions
rsvp.description: How guests respond and how you manage responses

items.question: How does the RSVP function work?
items.answer: Guests can indicate directly via the invitation whether they're coming. They fill in their name, choose 'Yes', 'No' or 'Maybe', and can optionally leave dietary requirements and a message.

items.question: Do I get a notification when someone responds?
items.answer: Yes! You receive an email for every new RSVP. In your dashboard you see an overview of all responses.

items.question: Can guests change their RSVP?
items.answer: Yes, guests can change their answer by responding again with the same email address. The old response is then updated.

items.question: Can I export the guest list?
items.answer: Yes, you can export all RSVP data to Excel or CSV. Convenient for planning tables, catering and other matters.

items.question: Can I set a deadline for RSVPs?
items.answer: Yes, you can set an RSVP deadline. After this date, guests can no longer respond via the invitation.

hero.label: Our story
hero.title: A tradition reborn in pixels
hero.subtitle: We believe some moments are too special for an ordinary invitation. That's why we're bringing back the magic of the wax seal - for a new generation.

story.title: For centuries, people sealed their most important messages with wax
paragraphs: Since the Middle Ages, the wax seal has been the symbol of important correspondence. Kings, queens, and lovers used it to protect and personalize their most precious messages. Breaking the seal was always a moment of tension and anticipation.
In a world of quick messages, we wanted to bring back that feeling. Not by going back in time, but by moving forward with technology that doesn't forget emotion.
When we were planning our own wedding, we noticed how impersonal digital invitations often feel. That could be different, we thought.

That's how Ja, Voor Altijd was born. A place where technology and tradition come together. Where your guests don't just open a link, but break a seal. Where the moment of inviting becomes truly special again.
